2026-02-10ISEDNational Research Council ActReappointment of a member of the National Research Council of CanadaRe-appointment of Pierre Rivard of Ottawa, Ontario, as a member of the National Research Council of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.N/A
subject: Reappointment of a member of the National Research Council of Canada
precis: Re-appointment of Pierre Rivard of Ottawa, Ontario, as a member of the National Research Council of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
